domain.name: Politician

text:
NEW: @BorisJohnson will make a statement to the Commons on Tuesday to announce:
🔹Reopening of some hospitality on 4th July.
🔹Changes to the 2m rule.

Govt will also publish detailed guidance to ensure companies that can reopen are ‘Covid secure’.

#COVID19
